DataElement.preferredName: VHL Gene Germline Mutation Identification Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text response indicating whether a germ-line mutation was identified while performing the VHL gene mutation analysis.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a known germline DNA repair defect (mismatch repair deficiency, POLE mutation, e.g.)? If not previously completed, germline sequencing is not required to determine trial eligibility.
